name: $oid
desc: A universally unique identifier of the form a5afddf4-e880-459b-876e-e4591b0acc11.

name: $uuid
desc: A uniform resource identifier (ideally a URL - uniform resource locator); e.g. http://unitsofmeasure.org.

name: $uri
desc: Some other type of unique identifier; e.g. HL7-assigned reserved string such as LN for LOINC.
